description.0: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously.
3: A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing <cryo>Cryo DMG</cryo>.
The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.5: "The blizzard veils the heron's thoughts, pity heavy in its heart."

name: Kamisato Ayaka
title: Frostflake Heron
description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing <cryo>AoE Cryo DMG</cryo>.
description.2: "Clouds shroud the moonlit night. Longing descends like a fog, filling the one detained with wanderlust."

description.1: Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her.
description.3: In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water.
description.4: When she reappears, the following effects occur:
5: Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply <cryo>Cryo</cryo> on nearby opponents.
Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with <cryo>Cryo</cryo> for a brief period.
description.7: "Feathers fleeting wet / the white heron treads water / a sight without flaw"

description.0: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.
When the Cryo application at the end of Kamisato Art: Senho hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.
When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.
When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.

Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.
